mods:titleInfo.mods:title: ACC-PARC Request for Coverage, Dr. Frank Menolascino

mods:name.mods:namePart: Detre Library & Archives, Heinz History Center

mods:mods.mods:abstract: An ACC-PARC request for media coverage of the visit of NARC (National Association for the Retarded) president, Dr. Frank Menolascino. Dr. Frank Menolascino was scheduled to speak in Pittsburgh and to receive the Institute of Pennsylvania Hospital Award in recognition of his advocacy for individuals with intellectual and developmental disabilities. ACC-PARC hoped to use his visit to draw attention to alternatives to institutionalization.

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Bob Nelkin Collection of ACC-PARC Records

mods:relatedItem.mods:note: Bob Nelkin Collection of ACC-PARC Records, 1953-2000, MSS 1002 , Detre Library and Archives, Senator John Heinz History Center
